---
title: "oci_provided_invalid_auth.yml"
---

## High-level description
This YAML configuration file defines storage settings for an OCI (Open Container Initiative) repository. It specifies invalid authentication type, which is likely used for testing purposes to ensure proper error handling when an invalid authentication method is provided.

## Symbols

### `storage`
#### Description
The root configuration block for storage settings.

#### Internal Logic
Defines the storage type as "oci" and includes nested configuration for OCI-specific settings.

___

### `storage.type`
#### Description
Specifies the type of storage to be used.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| type | string | Set to "oci" to indicate OCI storage type |

___

### `storage.oci`
#### Description
Contains the configuration settings specific to OCI storage.

#### Internal Logic
Defines various OCI-related settings such as repository, bundles directory, poll interval, and authentication.

___

### `storage.oci.repository`
#### Description
Specifies the target OCI repository.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| repository | string | The OCI repository URL and tag |

___

### `storage.oci.bundles_directory`
#### Description
Defines the directory where bundles will be stored locally.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| bundles_directory | string | The local directory path for storing bundles |

___

### `storage.oci.poll_interval`
#### Description
Sets the interval for polling the OCI repository for updates.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| poll_interval | duration | The time interval between polls (5 minutes in this case) |

___

### `storage.oci.authentication`
#### Description
Defines the authentication settings for accessing the OCI repository.

#### Internal Logic
In this case, it intentionally sets an invalid authentication type for testing purposes.

___

### `storage.oci.authentication.type`
#### Description
Specifies the type of authentication to be used.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| type | string | Set to "invalid" to test error handling for invalid authentication types |

## Configuration
| Option | Type | Default | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| storage.type | string | N/A | The type of storage (set to "oci") |
| storage.oci.repository | string | N/A | The OCI repository URL and tag |
| storage.oci.bundles_directory | string | N/A | Local directory for storing bundles |
| storage.oci.poll_interval | duration | N/A | Interval for polling the repository |
| storage.oci.authentication.type | string | N/A | Authentication type (set to "invalid") |

This configuration file is likely used in test scenarios to verify the system's behavior when presented with invalid authentication settings for OCI storage. It helps ensure that the application correctly handles and reports errors when misconfigured authentication is provided.
